item.title: Cover of lamp post is loose and electrics exposed, 12th January
item.description:
Good morning, The lamp post just outside our school, Ark Greenwich, has a loose cover. The electrics inside are exposed. Thanks Melani Kilroy

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shooters Hill Road, Blackheath

item.title: NOT FIXED! You have replied that this is Fixed but it has not been so reporting again! Unsafe dangerous foot/cycle way used by key workers from QM Hospital due to a number of lights out in the morning at 07:00hrs. The lights out are numbered FPF017,FPF019,FPF025., 12th January

item.title: Wrongful parking, 12th January
item.description:
Electric forest bikes shouldn’t take all the parking space for the regular bikes or bikes that are from a particular. It’s not fair as there is limited space for us to park. Please refrain from parking there. This looks like someone from the company has come and put them there on purpose.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Hornton Street, Kensington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
